entry.title: Chatsight Pivots Its Content Moderation A.I. to Battling Discord Scammers
entry.summary: Scams and phishing attacks continue to plague Web3 developers, costing the industry over $1 billion.

entry.title: Coinbase Launching 'Nano' Bitcoin Futures via Derivatives Exchange
entry.summary: Formerly called FairX, Coinbase Derivatives Exchange will offer futures priced at 1/100th of a Bitcoin through third-party brokers beginning Monday.

entry.title: Soccer Superstar Cristiano Ronaldo Is Making NFTs for Binance
entry.summary: Many pro athletes are diving headfirst into crypto and NFTs, and the Portuguese professional footballer is joining them.

entry.title: 'Strava Meets Pokémon Go': Stepn Has 3 Million Users, But Its Token Is Down 97%
entry.summary: Stepn's CMO joined the gm podcast to talk about the app's rapid growth, its tokenomics, and what it all says about the future of NFTs with utility.

entry.title: Meta, Microsoft and Other Tech Giants Say They Want an Open Metaverse—Should We Believe Them?
entry.summary: Meta and 34 other tech companies signed a pledge this week to work towards creating an open and interoperable metaverse. But leading voices in crypto aren't convinced.

entry.title: John McAfee's Widow Still Seeking Independent Autopsy One Year After Husband’s Death
entry.summary: The crypto evangelist was found dead in a Spanish prison last year after years on the run from U.S. authorities.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange CoinFLEX Freezes Withdrawals Due to Counterparty 'Uncertainty'
entry.summary: CoinFLEX joins Celsius, Babel Finance, Finblox, and Voyager Digital in either freezing or limiting user withdrawals. Who’s next?

entry.title: Solana Labs Launches Mobile Platform, Reveals Android Smartphone
entry.summary: The Solana Mobile Stack will enable more mobile Web3 apps, plus Solana Labs will launch its own smartphone in early 2023.

entry.title: Three Arrows-Exposed Voyager Digital Slashes Daily Withdrawal Limit by More Than 50%
entry.summary: The trading platform has reduced withdrawals limits to $10k from $25k following news of its involvement with the embattled Three Arrows Capital.

entry.title: Crypto Exchange Uphold Cuts Off Venezuela Due to 'Complexity' of US Sanctions
entry.summary: Two years after Venezuelan users first reported issues with Uphold following expanded U.S. sanctions, the exchange officially closes its doors to the South American nation.

entry.title: University of Cincinnati Adds Crypto Courses to Curriculum
entry.summary: As well as launching two new crypto programs, the Ohio-based university will add a lab space dedicated to cryptocurrency partnerships.

entry.title: Terra's Do Kwon: 'There Is a Difference Between Failing and Running a Fraud'
entry.summary: Terraform Labs co-founder Do Kwon insists he has always believed in the resilience of the Terra ecosystem.

entry.title: NHL Launching NFT Marketplace for Hockey Collectibles
entry.summary: The league has tapped Sweet to build a marketplace that will include gamified NFTs.

entry.title: Bank of England Deputy Governor: Crypto Crash Survivors Could Become Tomorrow's 'Amazons and eBays'
entry.summary: The latest crypto slump could be decisive in determining the industry’s future winners, according to Bank of England deputy governor Jon Cunliffe.

entry.title: Chainalysis Launches Crypto Crime Incident Response Program
entry.summary: The blockchain analytics firm has created a 24-hour hotline for businesses that have fallen victim to crypto crimes such as ransomware attacks.

entry.title: Polygon's MATIC Up 20% Amid Whale Accumulation, Carbon Neutrality Push
entry.summary: Ethereum layer 2 scaling solution Polygon claims to have achieved carbon neutrality through offsetting carbon credits.

entry.title: Coinbase to Phase Out Trader-Friendly ‘Pro’ Exchange
entry.summary: The standalone service will be replaced by Advanced Trade, a feature within the main Coinbase app.

entry.title: EBay Snaps Up NFT Marketplace KnownOrigin
entry.summary: One of the first NFT marketplaces, KnownOrigin has generated almost $8 million since launching in 2018.

entry.title: Why Bill Murray Is Making Ethereum NFTs About His Life
entry.summary: Murray’s son Jackson tells Decrypt about the actor’s new NFT project, which bundles infamous stories with in-person events and other perks.

entry.title: Shopify Adds NFT-Gated Option for Online Retailers
entry.summary: The e-commerce platform is allowing brands to make their shops more exclusive.

entry.title: The Bill Murray 1,000 NFT Project Reveal Trailer
entry.summary: A first look at actor Bill Murray's upcoming Ethereum NFT project with The Chive and Project Venkman.

entry.title: Tether to Launch Stablecoin Pegged to British Pound Sterling
entry.summary: The pound-pegged GBPT is set to join USDT, EURT, CHNT, and MXNT as Tether’s fifth stablecoin tied to a fiat currency.

entry.title: Blankos Block Party NFT Game to Launch on Epic Games Store
entry.summary: The game’s publisher, Mythical Games, also just released two other play-to-earn titles and is working with the NFL on its own NFT game.

entry.title: Powell Sees No ‘Macroeconomic Implications’ From Bitcoin Price Swings, But ‘Better Regulatory Framework’ Still Needed
entry.summary: Both crypto markets and traditional equity markets have taken a beating in 2022.

entry.title: Public Bitcoin Miners Are Selling Off BTC Reserves as Crypto Winter Sets In
entry.summary: If public Bitcoin miners sell large portions of their supply, "it could contribute to pushing the Bitcoin price further down," says crypto data firm Arcane Research.

entry.title: ECB President Lagarde: Crypto Staking and Lending Must Be Regulated
entry.summary: European Central Bank president Christine Lagarde argued for more regulation of the crypto space, covering lending and staking.

entry.title: BIS: Crypto's 'Structural Flaws' Make It Unsuitable as Basis for Monetary System
entry.summary: But central banks are very keen to develop and control their own cryptocurrencies.

entry.title: Voyager Digital Plummets 60% After Revealing $661M Exposure To 3AC
entry.summary: Cryptocurrency broker Voyager Digital has warned it may issue a "notice of default" to Three Arrows Capital.

entry.title: Dogecoin Worth Millions Linked To Illicit Activity Including Terrorism: Elliptic
entry.summary: A report from blockchain analytics firm Elliptic points to the increasing use of Dogecoin by criminals as payment for illegal activity.

entry.title: Binance US Eliminating Fees on Bitcoin Trades
entry.summary: The move comes as part of an effort to “help our market and customers in a time of need,” CEO Brian Shroder said.

entry.title: gm: Meet 'Move to Earn' NFT App Stepn
entry.summary: Stepn is the talk of Crypto Twitter: an app that rewards you in crypto for exercising outdoors. But first you have to buy a pricey sneaker NFT. Stepn CMO Shiti Manghani joined the gm podcast to talk about how the app works, its GST and GMT tokens, Stepn's recent decision regarding China, and why the future for NFTs is utility.

entry.title: European Commission Advisor: ‘We’re Currently Not on Track to Regulate DeFi’
entry.summary: At Brussels Blockchain Week, crypto enthusiasts met in the shadow of impending regulation—but the regulators themselves were few and far between.

entry.title: Former Huobi Senior Manager Accused of Illicit Trading: Report
entry.summary: A former senior manager at crypto exchange Huobi allegedly made around $5 million by trading against his own company.

entry.title: Doodles NFTs Announces Pharrell as Chief Brand Officer, Fundraise Led by Alexis Ohanian
entry.summary: The valuable NFT collection adds a famous face and fresh funding, plus announces plans for Doodles 2 avatars.

entry.title: Wyoming's Black Hills Energy Inks First Deal Under New Blockchain Tariff
entry.summary: The utility said attracting more blockchain companies to the state will increase tax revenue and create jobs.

entry.title: Afropolitan Raises $2.1 Million to Bring Web3 to the African Diaspora
entry.summary: The Web3 collective is looking to crypto and NFTs to support community-led opportunities for people of African descent.

entry.title: How a Solend Whale With a $108M Loan Nearly Crashed the Solana Network
entry.summary: A Solana whale nearly drained a liquidity pool, and it would have caused some major ripples—let’s dive in.

entry.title: Twitter’s Board Unanimously Recommends Elon Musk’s $44 Billion Takeover Bid
entry.summary: The board said the proposed takeover is “advisable and in the best interests of Twitter and its stockholders.”

entry.title: Uniswap Labs Buying Ethereum NFT Aggregator Genie
entry.summary: Watch out, OpenSea—Uniswap is making a push into NFTs.

entry.title: As Tether Faces Billions in Redemptions, Circle's USDC Is Gaining Ground
entry.summary: Tether's market cap has dropped by 19% since the start of May, while USDC's has climbed by 5%.

entry.title: Dogecoin, Shiba Inu Prices Pump as Elon Musk Doubles Down on DOGE
entry.summary: Is it dog coin season again already?

entry.title: Vitalik Buterin: Stock-to-Flow Bitcoin Price Model 'Really Not Looking Good Now'
entry.summary: The Ethereum co-founder took aim at the 'harmful' price model, which predicts that Bitcoin will go as high as $288,000.

entry.title: NFTs and Knife-Throwing Abound at Superchief Gallery in LA
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin talks to Superchief Gallery co-founder Edward Ed Zipco about NFTs and the potential for digital art at Superchief's 10 anniversary showing in Los Angeles.

entry.title: #DecryptLive: Luxury Fashion Brands Are Going Crypto
entry.summary: From Dolce & Gabbana to Balmain, big names in fashion are embracing crypto and NFTs. Decrypt's Stephen Graves, Dan Roberts, Sander Lutz and contributor Alys Keys discuss the trend.

entry.title: Collateralized Monkey JPEGs: CEO of Arcade Talks to Decrypt at Consensus
entry.summary: Arcade, an NFT liquidity provider, says it's facilitating $25 million in loans against blue-chip NFTs like Bored Apes. Arcade CEO Gabe Frank talks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson at Consensus 2022.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What is a Dapp?
entry.summary: A dapp is a decentralized app built on blockchains to give you more ownership and freedom in your digital life. Dapps are the next generation of software. Explore the vast selection of dapps on Ethereum today. Curious how to build dapps? Start building free at infura.io.

entry.title: Bringing 'Snow Crash' to Life: Neal Stephenson Talks to Decrypt at Consensus
entry.summary: Neal Stephenson, who coined the term "metaverse" in his seminal novel "Snow Crash," speaks to Decrypt's Jason Nelson along with Bitcoin Foundation founder Peter Vessenes, about the new "free metaverse" they're co-launching, Lamina1.

entry.title: Edge CEO Paul Puey Talks 'Confidential' Bitcoin Mastercard Launch
entry.summary: Paul Puey, CEO of Edge Wallet, spoke to Decrypt's Jason Nelson about Edge's announcement of a new "confidential" crypto Mastercard. After Edge announced the card on Wednesday, Mastercard blasted crypto media to say it has nothing to do with the product—despite Puey telling Decrypt, "MasterCard is involved in entire process. They fully approved this, it’s fully legal and approved by MasterCard. It fits entirely within their framework.”

entry.title: gm: Christine Brown Left Robinhood to Go Full NFT
entry.summary: Christine Brown left her perch as Robinhood Crypto COO at the end of March to launch a new crypto venture. Now she has announced her new gig: Co-founder and COO at Floor, a token-gated NFT portfolio app that has raised an $8 million seed round. She talked to Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Jeff Roberts about the company's plans, her own crypto and NFT bags, and her outlook on NFTs and on Robinhood.

entry.title: NBA's Spencer Dinwiddie Talks $26M Raise for Social Crypto App Calaxy
entry.summary: Spencer Dinwiddie's creator token platform Calaxy has raised another $26 million in funding. Dinwiddie tells Decrypt's Stacy Elliott what makes Calaxy stand out and why it can succeed.

entry.title: How To Change the 'NFTs Are Bad' Narrative: UnicornDAO Co-Founder Rebecca Lamis
entry.summary: Rebecca Lamis, who co-founded UnicornDAO with Nadya Tolokonnikova of the band Pussy Riot, sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson in Justin Aversano's new Quantum Art physical NFT space to discuss diversity and inclusion in Web3.

entry.title: Twin Flames Creator Justin Aversano Opens Physical NFT Space in LA
entry.summary: Quantum's Justin Aversano sits down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson at the new Quantum Spaces in Santa Monica, CA. Justin discusses the gallery, his new project Doppelganger, and what's next for real-world NFT exhibitions.

entry.title: NFTs with Utility: STEPN, NFTY Labs, Wax, and Gomu Predict What's Next
entry.summary: Shiti Manghani of STEPN, Ty Blackard of NFTY Labs, William Quigley of Wax blockchain, and Spencer Yang of Gomu talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts about how the next era of NFTs will have utility and real-world use cases, as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.

entry.title: Kraken's Dan Held Talks Bitcoin Maximalism and Crypto Winter
entry.summary: Dan Held, a longtime Bitcoin influencer and now head of growth marketing at crypto exchange Kraken, talks to Decrypt's Dan Roberts about Bitcoin maximalists (he calls himself a "mostamalist"), NFTs, and Crypto Winter as part of CoinMarketCap's The Capital virtual conference.

entry.title: What Is Runner? 'Hunger Games' Co-Producer's Web3 Sci-Fi Project
entry.summary: Decrypt's Kate Irwin speaks with Hollywood producer Bryan Unkeless and team members Bryce Anderson and Blaise Hemingway about their Web3 sci-fi project Runner, starting with an NFT project and a comic book all about racing.

entry.title: ‘The Irishman’ Exec Producer Niels Juul Gets Into NFTs
entry.summary: Decrypt’s Kate Irwin talks to veteran Hollywood film producer Niels Juul about why he’s going all in on NFTs and Web3.

entry.title: Decrypt at Cannes: Decentralized Pictures CEO Leo Matchett Talks Hollywood Embracing Crypto
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stephen Graves heads to the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he sits down with Leo Matchett of Decentralized Pictures, the Roman Coppola-backed nonprofit using crypto and blockchain voting to find, fund, and produce films.

entry.title: Decrypt at Cannes: 'Calladita' Director Miguel Faus on Funding Films with NFTs
entry.summary: Decrypt's Stephen Graves is on the scene at the 2022 Cannes Film Festival, where he spoke to Miguel Faus, director of the film "Calladita," who funded his movie by selling NFTs to backers including NounsDAO.
